abstract: The framework generates environment textures only for probe anchors you explicitly add to the session.
overview:
## Discussion

When you use this [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/environmentTexturing-swift.property] option, you must manually choose when and where to generate environment map textures:

If you display AR content using [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNView], SceneKit automatically retrieves texture maps from probe anchors and uses them to light the scene. Otherwise, use a delegate method such as [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)-3qtt8] to find out when the probe anchor’s texture has been updated and access the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/AREnvironmentProbeAnchor/environmentTexture] property.

# ARWorldTrackingConfiguration.EnvironmentTexturing.manual

**Case**

The framework generates environment textures only for probe anchors you explicitly add to the session.

## Declaration

```swift
case manual
```

## Discussion

When you use this [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/environmentTexturing-swift.property] option, you must manually choose when and where to generate environment map textures:

1. Create an [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/AREnvironmentProbeAnchor] object with a `transform` indicating its position in the scene.
2. Add the probe anchor to the session with the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession/add(anchor:)] method.

If you display AR content using [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSCNView], SceneKit automatically retrieves texture maps from probe anchors and uses them to light the scene. Otherwise, use a delegate method such as [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSessionDelegate/session(_:didUpdate:)-3qtt8] to find out when the probe anchor’s texture has been updated and access the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/AREnvironmentProbeAnchor/environmentTexture] property.
title: ARWorldTrackingConfiguration.EnvironmentTexturing.manual
